header.message: @drhoagie @wkrn Scary part is, the people who search you at the airport may be meth addicts or have the chemicals on them. Not good. #TSA
Man arrested after threatening to blow up school bus

body.title: Man arrested after threatening to blow up school bus
body.description: Authorities in Henry County arrested Steven Decker, 27, Wednesday morning after he threatened to blow up a school bus with students onboard.
